mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card (list_id, title, description, order_index, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at) VALUES (#{listId}, #{title}, #{description}, 0, NOW(), NOW(), NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT id, list_id, title, description, order_index AS orderIndex FROM card WHERE list_id = #{listId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY order_index ASC
